long_description: Portland is a bike-friendly city, and the color-coded. Published by Portland Metro; copyright 2010. Double-sided map is printed on waterproof, tear-resistant synthetic paper; measures 9 x 4.5 in. folded, 35 x 26.5 in. open. Scale: 1 in. = 0.75 mi. Color-coded streets outline bicycle suitability and relative safety; shaded relief shows hills and mountains. Features large insets of downtown Portland and 7 suburban cities. Provides riding safety tips and Portland's bike laws and regulations.
short_description: Portland is a bike-friendly city, and the color-coded Bike There! map shows the safest routes to navigate around town and through the suburbs.
